title: 1(3) of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 8
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited work life balance miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2023

title: 1(3) of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 8
heading: 2. The 27th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which 
section 7 of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 
(No. 8 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 November, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [573] 3
